title: Devil's Food Murder
description: *This is book 10 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   Missy's new boyfriend Chas has a past, and now it turns out he's betrothed, or at least he was supposed to be. After an apparent murder at the family function where Missy is trying to make a good impression, Chas works to clear her name while Missy is attacked by the presumed killer, and time is running out.  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1zyu5vx Book 2: http://amzn.to/1F4EZvi Book 3: http://amzn.to/1Eq21qR Book 4: http://amzn.to/1L0JO7m Book 5: http://amzn.to/1BlRwDY Book 6: http://amzn.to/1Jt6HBP Book 7: http://amzn.to/1B5eAfF Book 8: http://amzn.to/1GftATX Book 9: http://amzn.to/1J27RmG   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Carol Durand
